name: Udaak
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Charge: If the udaak moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21+1d10 + 16 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away from the udaak and knocked prone.
traits.Siege Monster: The udaak deals double damage to objects and structures.
